name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger has counted the number of Taiwanese artists who have expressed their views on "national reunification" on Weibo recently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At this moment, the Legislative Yuan on Jinan Road in Taipei is on scene

RTI provided by Taiwan Central Broadcasting Corporation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens flocked to the Taiwanese artist's Weibo to ask him to make a statement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 24, many media personnel reported that the Haikou Intermediate People's Court refused to accept the legal procedures entrusted by the defendant to lawyer Zhang Qingfang. Lawyer Zhang Qingfang firmly defended his right to defense in court and was then forcibly taken away by several bailiffs before the trial.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 23, a knife attack occurred in Xiaowu Township, Xiaochang County, Hubei Province, resulting in 8 deaths and 1 injury. The deceased included the suspect's 80-year-old mother.
An insider revealed that the suspect had a history of mental illness for many years, his wife had passed away many years ago, and his son is currently in his teens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many parents have complained that the Xiaotiancai phone watch frequently triggers sensitive words, resulting in a situation where parents and children cannot communicate normally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the 23rd and 24th, some Taiwanese bloggers posted videos expressing their unwillingness to be cannon fodder and their desire to return to the embrace of their motherland.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 23, the statue of Li Zicheng on the Xiguan roundabout in Changping, Beijing was demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humane China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos on June 4th. Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 12 (May 24)
[One hundred thousand students swore an oath to defend the square] [The entry into Beijing failed, martial law troops withdrew]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 24, Shanxi: Longxin Ceramics Factory has been in arrears of wages for five months, and workers are holding banners outside the factory demanding their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 24, Suizhou, Hubei. Yulong Water Supply Company raised a large amount of funds from the public under the pretext of a water network renovation project and then collapsed. 
On that day, citizens came to the Suizhou Water Affairs Business Office to defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In front of the Taipei Legislative Yuan
"Freedom will not fall from the sky, democracy should not stand idly by"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, outside the Taipei Legislative Yuan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a female student from Fuzhou University posted a message saying that she was molested by a male student from the same school. However, despite irrefutable evidence, the counselor and school leaders repeatedly excused the boy by saying that he was a poor student, trying to get the girl not to take legal action, saying, "He still wants to be the class monitor next semester," "Can you give me a chance to educate him?" The boy was only detained by the police station for 15 days, and the content of the campus confession wall that spread the relevant information was deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Legislative Yuan held a meeting today (24) to continue reviewing various bills related to congressional reform aimed at expanding the power of the Legislative Yuan and supervising the power of the executive branch. Since the morning, the relevant provisions of the "Legislative Yuan Powers Act" have been reviewed, including amendments to "investigation power" and "hearings". The Democratic Progressive Party, a minority party in the Legislative Yuan, adopted a delaying tactic, raising objections one by one and requesting repeated votes to delay time. Kuomintang Legislative Yuan Speaker Han Kuo-yu announced the passage of the motion to extend the term.
